Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    An Item with a name and a price for using the Shopping Cart Project.
    Since:
    3/10/2017 AP CS with Mr. Bergquist Shopping Cart Project
    Author:
    Lukas Strobel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            double price)
        Basic Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Item.
        price - The price for a non-bulk order of the Item, in USD.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - On negative price value.

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            double price,
            int bulkQuantity,
            double bulkPrice)
        Extended Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Item.
        price - The price for a non-bulk order of the Item, in USD.
        bulkQuantity - How many of this Item need to be bought to apply bulkPrice.
        bulkPrice - The price for bulk orders of the Item, in USD.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - On negative values for all params.

    • Method Detail

      • priceFor

        public double priceFor(int quantity)
        This method is used to get the price for a given quantity of this Item.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The amount of the item.
        Returns:
        The price for the given quantity, taking into account bulk discounts.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - On a negative quantity.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The toString
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The listing formatted for the GUI
